title: Can we release whatever new Vayne skin is currently in the works right now?
body: So we can finally nerf her after selling it?

replies.body: Can i go two posts in G and B without seeing a vayne QQ?
Don't worry, I'll add some more Mordekaiser threads to the mix :^)
After shes nerfed :^)

Anyone look at her pick rate for last month? Its a little high... Like 500,000 games high. The next highest was like Yasuo or thresh coming in at 200,000. When something is spammed this much its obvious something is going on... BTW Urgot had 8000 games played
#buffurgot

> [{quoted}](name=WolfBV,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wfUZmvrI,comment-id=000700030000,timestamp=2015-09-10T06:10:43.415+0000)
>
> Why is this man building Bloodthirster first and Blade of the Ruined King fourth on Vayne.

Because it works and I prefer the sustain and laning power it gives.  I don't care if it doesnt work in Diamond, I win far more games than I lose on Vayne.  

Not everyone has to be a metabad.  Maybe you are not smart enough to understand the game to the level that you can make your own build choices, but some of us do.  There is more than one build that a champ can use.  

Vayne is fine.  Other ADCs are need love.  The reason she is picked so much right now is because so many of the others are just awful to play.

1: That lowers your damage output A LOT, like a shit ton.
2: You don't need more then the BorKT sustain early.
3: You bronze 1 don't say "Your not at the level"
4: If you won more then you lost with vayne, you wouldn't be in Bronze 1

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul245,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wfUZmvrI,comment-id=00070003000000000002,timestamp=2015-09-10T21:12:15.228+0000)
>
> 1: That lowers your damage output A LOT, like a shit ton.
> 2: You don't need more then the BorKT sustain early.
> 3: You bronze 1 don't say "Your not at the level"
> 4: If you won more then you lost with vayne, you wouldn't be in Bronze 1

If I played ranked I might care about if I was bronze or not.  I don't, and if you had bothered to check my match history further you would have seen that.  Congrats on failing at the internet.  

So do dumb it down for you (not sure I can get it low enough, but work with me here), my rating doesn't change because I don't ever play ranked.  I did about 10 games before I decided I hated the idea of having to learn every role.  If they add a team builder to ranked, I will try it again.

Or did you need a cute numbered list too?  It is fact that I win a lot more than I lose on Vayne.
Lol bronze players be like: "I'm bronze because I don't try to get a better rank 8D"

> [{quoted}](name=FamousPain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wfUZmvrI,comment-id=0007000300000000000200000000,timestamp=2015-09-10T23:12:51.044+0000)

It's ok, not everyone can actually understand the game enough to build their own items.  You just stick to the meta like a good little baddie.  You dont need to be angry about it.  

Lol epeen tryhards be like "durp durp durp da ranked durp".
You know this game's community has gone to shit when Vayne mains call other people meta sheep LOL
Mad shitters be shitting all day :^)

I am guessing ignorance is a way of life for you, sounds about right.  I guess we confirmed all we need to know about you.  Typical metabad.
I have absolutely no reason to confirm whether you're bronze or unranked. You're fucking stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Mike17032,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wfUZmvrI,comment-id=0007000300000000,timestamp=2015-09-10T18:10:52.824+0000)

> Not everyone has to be a metabad.  Maybe you are not smart enough to understand the game to the level that you can make your own build choices, but some of us do.  There is more than one build that a champ can use.  

There's a reason the majority of Vayne players build BotRK first on Vayne. I'm not saying BT first is bad (I remember when some ADCs like CandyPanda would max Tumble and build BT into Tri Force). It can obviously work since you and I'm sure many others find success on it. BotRK just synergies so well with her entire kit that it is a little odd to see it come so late in a Vayne build.
Also unnecessary insult is unnecessary. Like I said above - there's a reason almost every Vayne player builds BotRK first. Not because they're "meta sheep" but because it's been tested and proven to be the best first item on Vayne in the majority of situations. Particularly since we were in a tank meta for so long. Who wouldn't want to play their champion optimally?

> [{quoted}](name=pacifishstick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wfUZmvrI,comment-id=00070003000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-10T18:52:34.788+0000)
>
> There's a reason the majority of Vayne players build BotRK first on Vayne. I'm not saying BT first is bad (I remember when some ADCs like CandyPanda would max Tumble and build BT into Tri Force). It can obviously work since you and I'm sure many others find success on it. BotRK just synergies so well with her entire kit that it is a little odd to see it come so late in a Vayne build.
> Also unnecessary insult is unnecessary. Like I said above - there's a reason almost every Vayne player builds BotRK first. Not because they're "meta sheep" but because it's been tested and proven to be the best first item on Vayne in the majority of situations. Particularly since we were in a tank meta for so long. Who wouldn't want to play their champion optimally?

You are right about the insult, apologies.  I have tried BotRK first, and maybe it just doesn't fit with my style as well but I always felt like I had less power.  I have well over a thousand games played with her, and have tried lots of builds over the years.  The one I find that I like best is usually not the most popular one.  

It's true you get sustain from BotRK, but you get more from BT.  And I find that I do better in lane trades with it.  I am not saying its "better" or even optimal in any math sense, but I find that I do better when I go with BT, PD, IE (With boots in there somewhere earlier on) and then get BotRK.  I do think BotRK is great, but it's power is even better later game when HP is higher.
you know fiora was changed, right?
She does?
the meta hasn't been 3 tanks for quite some time, Sated Devourer saw to that. Now it's like, tank support and maybe a juggernaut top or jungle, but Vayne hasn't gotten any less dominant.
I really hope sivir gets the victorious skin and not vayne (a rioter said its going to an adc this year)

Victorious skins is about champions that were shaping the meta ATM, it's not going to be vayne.

Most choices are Sivir, Kalista, or possibly, Ashe

There's also Jinx and Kog'Maw to consider.

I don't think Kalista is gonna get the Victorious skin, since she's already getting the Championship skin.
You wouldn't expect the double whammy, just what Riot wants. Then BAM, a M. Night. Shamalamadingdog twist!

Sad part is, this is probably accurate.
We're on 5.17. World's will be played on 5.18. Look for nerfs (or the ADC rework) on 5.19 (3-5 weeks).
it was over a year ago but if memory serves me right they buffed vayne last season before worlds...

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?roleSort=ADC&sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend
She has 3-4 adc champs with higher win rate.

Except Mordekaiser's win rate is incorrect... For the one-millionth time. Varus doesn't count with a 3% pick rate and Ashe is negligible. Jinx and Vayne are the top adcs right now and they are in LITERALLY EVERY FUCKING GAME.
Ashe is strong....? people just like the mechanics of vayne and jinx and kalista, not the brain dead gameplay of ashe or cait, they are not op theyre just more fun to play.
Ashe is non-impactful. Less than 1% ban rate and less than 10% pick. I would say that there are not enough people playing her consistently to give her an accurate win %.
positive win-loss ratio, 37.79 play %, 13% ban rate, and at the time of this post went down 3 slots. I am not sure when the last time they updated that however

What's with this hate towards Riot thinking , there a money grubbing company that would do something like this? God most boards people are idiots. To even think this. As dumb as the dam conspiracy theorists in the real world.
Despite the savage Memes, Riot doesn't care about nerfing champions that get a skin. Remember that Rito released GotS Kha'Zix after the trash?
and they made no money off it, so they won't be doing that again anytime soon :^)
